page.title: 03Footpaths
page.content: The footpaths in our area are so various that they cannot all be named. Many of them are through beautiful areas of nature. Some of them are having problems because of vandals and are needing repair. Also the amount of people going through these paths make it very muddy and hard to walk through. Farmers are a major problem. They do not like the idea of footpaths going through their fields reducing their land crops. Some of the farmers plough up the paths. In the Aston Clinton area a farmer had the nerve to plough up the path in his field but fortunately he was fined for it at a sum of Â£620. Many people hope it will soon be against the law for people to do this.
